column4: Hi guys, I need help, my gdm and kdm have the wrong resolution for my monitor, and configuring the xorg.conf in /etc/X11 doesn't do anything, even by setting the correct modeline
The desktop itself is the correct resolution, just the gdm and kdm isn't
delete all resolution higher than your want.
that's what I did, but still the same problem
if here some higher resolution in xorg.conf? or paste your xorg.conf
the other computer doesn't have internet access, but let me try one thing and i'll get back to you.
the new intel driver was the problem
